title: Application
fullText:
This section specifies the minimum requirements for inspection and testing to satisfy the fundamental safety principles in relation to verification of an installation in a connectable electrical installation.
When carrying out verification, precautions shall be taken to ensure the safety of persons, and to avoid damage to property and the electrical installation equipment during inspection and testing.
Connectable electrical installation verification shall be completed by a competent person.
NOTE Local regulatory requirements may apply in relation to licensing and qualifications.
